description: Defines the Firestore structure for the TipTap Editor module settings.

presets_document.description: A single document that holds multiple presets as a map.

presets.description: A map where each key is a preset ID (e.g., 'invite_email', 'default') and the value is the preset object.

content.description: The TipTap editor content as a JSON string.

toolbar_config_document.description: Stores the default toolbar configuration for the TipTap editor.

toolbar.description: An ordered array of objects representing the toolbar items.
